explanation: [0-0] In the frame, a short-haired woman with her back to the front and a long-haired little girl facing the front are holding hands. There is a blue sled on the right side of the little girl. The subtitle "JUST SOME TOURISTS ENJOYING A DESERT" appears at the top of the screen, and the subtitle "SUPER CRYSTAL" appears at the bottom of the screen. Their hair stands on end.

[0-7] At the beginning, the long-haired girl turns around and walks slowly with the short-haired woman. A man in white on the left appears in the picture, turns around, and smiles at the short-haired woman. Another man in black appears on the left, holding up his mobile phone to take pictures. The white subtitles above read: BUT WHY THEIR HAIRS ARE UP?
